title: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e: 2-nensei-hen
original_name: ようこそ実力至上主義の教室へ ２年生編
sinopse:
As Kiyotaka Ayanokouji and his classmates begin their second-year life, changes are seen everywhere throughout Koudo Ikusei High School. With the third-years having graduated and incoming first-years entering the school, alliances are well underway. Additionally, now that Nagumo Miyabi is the student council president, the promise of turning the school into a meritocracy may become a reality.

Meanwhile, conflicts between classes continue to build as the class point totals draw close. With another special exam looming ahead, will Ayanokouji remain in the shadows, or will he finally enter the spotlight and help his class rise to the illustrious Class A?

[Source My Anime List]
